mireka.list
Class MailingLists

Object
  mireka.list.MailingLists
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecipientDestinationMapper
public class MailingLists
extends Object
implements RecipientDestinationMapper

MailingLists is a collection of mailing lists, used in the configuration files. It can also be used as a RecipientDestinationMapper.

          Returns the destination of mails sent to this user; or null if it does not know the recipient.
